page.title: 07The Parish Church Part 4
page.content: There is a great link between the village school and St. Andrew's Church.The school is called St.Andrew's C. of E. Primary School. The school attends Church at least once every half term. The children walk to Church from the school via Oudle Lane and Church Lane, in their various classes, supervised by their class teachers.A number of the children are members of the Church choir and choir practices are often held in the school hall. At the beginning of this year the church services for several weeks were held in the school hall whilst the church roof was treated for death watch beetle. Being affiliated to the church the school enjoys 2 half-day holidays each year; one on Ascension Day and the other on St. Andrew's Day.
